stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements about electromagnetic and sound waves is true?
choicesHtml: Electromagnetic waves can only propagate through a vacuum, while sound waves can only propagate through a medium.
Electromagnetic waves can only propagate through a vacuum, while sound waves can propagate through either a vacuum or certain media.
Electromagnetic waves can propagate through either a vacuum or certain media, while sound waves can only propagate through a medium.
Electromagnetic waves and sound waves can both propagate through either a vacuum or certain media.
